p: The hepatic-nephric enzymes levels such as alkaline phosphatase (ALP), alanine and aspartate aminotransferase (ALT and AST), urea and creatinine were determined using liver and kidney tissues homogenates respectively. The Randox colorimetric kits (UK) were used for performing all these biochemical analysis and optical density was noted using UV-visible spectrophotometer (Hitachi U-2000) following manufacturer instructions.
